Social And Cultural Activities: Participated actively in Art of Living and conducting
Special Interests: Reading, organic farming, spirituality, personality deveolpment, yoga, water conservation, infrastructure development in rural and semi-urban areas
Educational Qualifications: B.E. (Mech.) Educated at Government College of Engineering, Amravati, Maharashtra
Other Information: Conferred (i) Maharashtra Goverment Industry Award for excellent performance 1987; and (ii) Late Shri Vasantrao Naik Memorial Award for outstanding work in agriculture sector; President, Akola Engineers and Architects Association; Sinchai Sahayog Akola; Maharashtra State Seeds Corporation Ltd.; and Executive Council, Dr. Panjabrao Deshmukh Agricultural University,2000-04
